original_title: Three arrested with over 1,227 kgs of Cannabis
original_body_lines: Three persons have been taken into custody along with 1,227 Kgs of Cannabis during a raid on a house in Embilipitiya.
The suspects, two drivers and a conductor, aged between 27 and 39 were arrested while packing the Cannabis.
This seizure is reportedly the largest single haul of Cannabis so far in Sri Lanka. (DSB)
